summary: The module supplies utilities for constructing and rendering visual representations of Prefect workflow task relationships. It offers a contextâ€‘managed registry to collect visualization tasks, encapsulates each visual rendering operation with its configuration, and provides helper routines to assemble task dependency information and generate Graphviz diagrams.
business_intent: Enable developers to automatically generate and display dependency graphs for Prefect flows, facilitating insight into task orchestration and improving debugging and documentation of data pipelines.
